trans-unit.source: Declares permissions for loading types from assemblies that are used by a XAML reader or writer.
trans-unit.target: Déclare des autorisations pour le chargement de types à partir des assemblys utilisés par un lecteur ou un writer XAML.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is relevant for scenarios such as whether internal types are permitted to load under partial trust.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> s’applique à des scénarios tels que si les types internes sont autorisés à charger en confiance partielle.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: An enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Jeu énumérable de valeurs <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> spécifiques.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using an enumerable set of specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, à l'aide d'un jeu énumérable de valeurs <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> spécifiques.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with each `allowedAccess` entry as an item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Un appel à ce constructeur initialise la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection avec chaque `allowedAccess` entrée sous la forme d’un élément et affecte au retour de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> à `false` dans l’instance créée.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> contained invalid information, such as a null item.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> contient des informations non valides, telles qu'un élément null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: Valeur d'énumération <see cref="T:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using existing permissions.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> à l'aide des autorisations existantes.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `true` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Security.Permissions.PermissionState.Unrestricted> affecte au retour de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> à `true` dans l’instance créée.

trans-unit.source: Any call to this constructor sets the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection to `null` because it is not relevant if permissions are being reported rather than <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.
trans-unit.target: Tout appel à ce constructeur définit la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection `null` , car il ne s’applique pas si les autorisations sont signalées au lieu de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel>.

trans-unit.source: The defining <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Valeur <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> de définition.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> class, using a single <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> value.
trans-unit.target: Initialise une nouvelle instance de la classe <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> avec une seule valeur <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" />.

trans-unit.source: A call to this constructor initializes the <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection with `allowedAccess` as the only item, and sets the return for <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> to `false` in the created instance.
trans-unit.target: Un appel à ce constructeur initialise la <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> collection avec `allowedAccess` en tant que le seul élément et affecte au retour de <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> à `false` dans l’instance créée.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="allowedAccess" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Gets the list of all <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values that this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> represents.
trans-unit.target: Obtient la liste de toutes les valeurs <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> que ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> représente.

trans-unit.source: A read-only list of <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> values, or <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Liste de valeurs <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> en lecture seule, ou <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: If the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is initialized such that <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> may be `null`.
trans-unit.target: Si le courant <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> est initialisé telles que <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> est `true`, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> peut être `null`.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns an identical copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Crée et retourne une copie identique de l'objet <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> en cours.

trans-unit.source: A copy of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Une copie de l'élément <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel.

trans-unit.source: Per the interface contract of <xref:System.Security.IPermission> this value is <xref:System.Security.IPermission> in the signature but can be cast to <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.
trans-unit.target: Par le contrat d’interface de <xref:System.Security.IPermission> cette valeur est <xref:System.Security.IPermission> dans la signature mais peut être converti en <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission>.

trans-unit.source: The XML encoding to use to reconstruct the security object.
trans-unit.target: Encodage XML à utiliser pour reconstruire l’objet de sécurité.

trans-unit.source: Reconstructs a security object with a specified state from an XML encoding.
trans-unit.target: Reconstruit un objet de sécurité avec un état spécifié à partir d’un encodage XML.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> est <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="elem" /> does not contain the XML encoding for a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="elem" /> ne contient pas l'encodage XML pour un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: - ou -

trans-unit.source: The version attribute within <paramref name="elem" /> is not supported.
trans-unit.target: L'attribut de version dans <paramref name="elem" /> n'est pas pris en charge.

trans-unit.source: The specific <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> to check for.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> spécifique à rechercher.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> includes a specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> in its <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list.
trans-unit.target: Retourne si ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> inclut un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlAccessLevel" /> spécifié dans sa liste <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> exists as an item in the <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> list of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> existe comme élément dans la liste <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" /> du <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: Sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> is null.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="requestedAccess" /> a la valeur null.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to intersect with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> qui fera une intersection avec le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Peut être <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates and returns a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that is the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crée et retourne un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> qui représente l'intersection entre le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel et l'autorisation spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: A new permission that represents the intersection of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouvelle autorisation qui représente l'intersection entre le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel et le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> spécifié.

trans-unit.source: This new permission is <see langword="null" /> if the intersection is empty.
trans-unit.target: Cette nouvelle autorisation est <see langword="null" /> si l'intersection est vide.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Pour une union, intersect et la logique de sous-ensemble, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> est vérifié en premier et peut retourner un résultat basé uniquement sur ce contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ensuite, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> est activée.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> n'est pas <see langword="null" /> ou n'est pas un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: A permission that is to be tested for the subset relationship.
trans-unit.target: Autorisation qui doit être testée pour la relation de sous-ensemble.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Peut être <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Détermine si le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel est un sous-ensemble de l'autorisation spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> is a subset of the specified permission; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si l'autorisation <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> en cours est un sous-ensemble de l'autorisation spécifiée ; sinon, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Pour une union, intersect et la logique de sous-ensemble, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> est vérifié en premier et peut retourner un résultat basé uniquement sur ce contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ensuite, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> est activée.

trans-unit.source: If `target` is `null` and the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is both <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` and has an empty <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> list, this method returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: Si `target` est `null` et actuel <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> est à la fois <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> `false` et est vide <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> liste, cette méthode retourne `true`.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="target" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="target" /> n'est pas <see langword="null" /> ou n'est pas un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.

trans-unit.source: Returns whether this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: Retourne si ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> dénote des autorisations illimitées.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> denotes unrestricted permissions.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> si ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> dénote des autorisations illimitées.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> if this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> has specific access level restrictions in <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />, or has no permissions.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="false" /> si ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> a des restrictions de niveau d'accès spécifiques dans <see cref="P:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess" />, ou n'a pas d'autorisations.

trans-unit.source: Creates an XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and its current state.
trans-unit.target: Crée un encodage XML de ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> et de son état actuel.

trans-unit.source: An XML encoding of this <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, including any state information.
trans-unit.target: Encodage XML de ce <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />, y compris des informations d'état.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> to combine with the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> à combiner au <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel.

trans-unit.source: Can be <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: Peut être <see langword="null" />.

trans-unit.source: Creates a permission that is the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified permission.
trans-unit.target: Crée une autorisation qui est l'union entre le <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel et l'autorisation spécifiée.

trans-unit.source: A new <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> that represents the union of the current <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> and the specified <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: Nouveau <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> qui représente l'union du <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> actuel et du <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" /> spécifié.

trans-unit.source: For union, intersect, and subset logic, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> is checked first, and might return a result based solely on that check.
trans-unit.target: Pour une union, intersect et la logique de sous-ensemble, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.IsUnrestricted%2A> est vérifié en premier et peut retourner un résultat basé uniquement sur ce contrôle.

trans-unit.source: Next, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> is checked.
trans-unit.target: Ensuite, <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission.AllowedAccess%2A> est activée.

trans-unit.source: If `other` is `null`, the current <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> is returned.
trans-unit.target: Si `other` est `null`, actuel <xref:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission> est retourné.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="other" /> is not <see langword="null" /> or is not a <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="other" /> n'est pas <see langword="null" /> ou n'est pas un <see cref="T:System.Xaml.Permissions.XamlLoadPermission" />.
